entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dictionary property causes build crash when generating OpenAPI document at build time #56307
  • When calling httpclient in injecting func #56306
  • Support options for setting callback used to generated reference IDs in OpenAPI #56305
  • SignalR eats JSON serialization exceptions during streaming responses #56303
  • How to send a Microsoft Identity Platform sign in request? #56302
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #56301
  • Allow content type header in response to contain chartset=utf-8 encoding #56299
  • At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly: A11y_ASP.NET_BlazorWebAssemblyStandalone_Home_Reflow #56295
    9.0-preview7
  • Narrator screen reader is not announcing "Please check your email to reset your password" status message: A11y_ASP.NET_Login_ForgetYourPassword_ScreenReader #56294
    9.0-preview7
  • AccessTokenFactory improvement options #56290
  • Visual and programmatic label of "Email" field is not same: A11y_ASP.NET_BlazorWebApp_Register_DevTools #56289
    9.0-preview7
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.5.24277.8] Fail to publish react project with error message "The ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly. #56288
    9.0-preview6
  • As soon the "Create movies" page open, keyboard focus starts from outside of the page which is incorrect: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_Keyboard #56287
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56286
  • Screen reader is not announcing error when required "Title", "Genre" and "Rating" fields kept blank: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_ScreenReader #56284
    9.0-preview7
  • "Title", "Genre" and "Rating" fields are required but screen reader is not announcing as required: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_ScreenReader #56283
    9.0-preview7
  • Blazor web app auto mode stop working some times. #56282
  • Cannot create a `blazorwasm` template project with name including emoji #56277

Closed

  • At 100% "BlazorWebAssemblyStandalone" template name is truncating and not visible clearly :A11y_ASP.NET_BlazorWebAssemblyStandalone_Usability #56296
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #56285

PullRequests

Created

  • Work around auth issues with new internal source changes #56308
    area-infrastructure
  • ReasonPhrases as switch instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #56300
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner #56292
    area-mvc
  • Skip Templates.Mvc.Tests in Helix on Debian12 and Mariner #56291
    area-mvc
  • Don't use diagnostics memory pool in GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #56281
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Use exact runtime for non-servicing builds of Blazor DevServer #56278
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Skip SpotBugs for now #56297
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Improve doc in IAuthenticationHandler #56196
    area-networking, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56244
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • [release/8.0] Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56181
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
